newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Interros-MFK to bid for Svyazinvest stake.
newsitem.headline: Russian Interros-MFK to bid for Svyazinvest stake.

text.p: Russian financial industrial group Interros and Bank MFK (ICFI) intends to bid for a 25 percent plus one share stake in telecoms holding company Svyazinvest, a spokesman for an Interros company said on Friday.
"Interros and MFK intend to take part in the Svyazinvest auction," the spokesman for Uneximbank (Oneksimbank in Russian), part of the Interros group and related to Bank MFK, said.
Rules for the auction which ends July 25 hold that bidders must deposit $400 million towards the $1.18 billion starting price by July 21.
Svyazinvest, which holds controlling packets in 88 regional and other telecoms companies, is a key player in the development of Russia's telecom industry.
